channel.title: Cloudflare R2 Incidents
channel.description: RSS feed of Cloudflare incidents related to R2

item.title: Increase in R2 Sippy 404s
item.description: Cloudflare is investigating reports of Sippy returning 404 on objects which do exist at the upstream provider. We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. Updates will be posted as they become available.
